trans.tran_cn: (Sever)人名；(俄)谢韦尔；(捷、塞、意、西、土、瑞典、罗)塞韦尔；(英)塞弗；(德)泽弗

trans.tran_en: to cut through something completely, separating it into two parts, or to become cut in this way
